purpose: Facilitates the deployment and management of AI agents with a focus on enterprise applications
principle: Built on a modular architecture allowing easy integration of different AI models and services
reusability: Offers a pluggable SDK and APIs for integrating various AI models, supports customization and scalability
limitations: Early-stage development, may lack comprehensive documentation and community support
name: eidolon
description: The first AI Agent Server, Eidolon is a pluggable Agent SDK and enterprise ready, deployment server for Agentic applications
highlight: Enterprise-ready, pluggable AI Agent SDK and deployment server for Agentic applications
